description:
Public speaking Mastery with Hypnosis for rapid results that you can test 

Learn how to change if you feel anxious or fearful about public speaking and sharing your knowledge with a large audience this is the course for you. It is not a course for teaching what to say or how to say it what your body language should because if you deliberately change your body language you look uneasy and false that is all the audience will perceive even if you have amazing information to offer them.

This course is going to change how you feel about being in front a audience from being a fearful or anxious experience to being an exciting experience that you will look forward to, and by using EFT and Hypnosis and making these changes to feeling more at ease while giving a presentation you will sub-communicate that to your audience that they will see by your natural body language and this will make them feel more at ease and open to digest your message.

What I will teach you in this course for public speaking mastery

1. You will begin by creating an image in your mind of what you want so that you will know where you are going by having a destination to reach seeing yourself making an excellent presentation.

2. Learn a secret feel good trigger that will help you through any bad times or set backs on your way.

3. learn how your mind and body work together with some fun but important lessons that will improve the results of this hypnotherapy session.

4. Learn how you naturally resist changes even changes that can be very good for you

5. Learn just how powerful words can be and their effect on you physically even if they are only self talk.

6. Learn who can and cannot be hypnotized

7. Learn how you can have a feeling excellence any time you want to

8. Public speaking Mastery with Hypnosis for rapid results 

bonus section

Assertiveness Hypnosis

9. How to use and apply EFT in the bonus section an amazingly powerful technique that can eliminate any limiting bad feelings that have been stopping you from doing what you need to do to be a powerful public speaker

All Files and videos are downloadable for easier access
title: Public speaking Mastery with Hypnosis for rapid results
